### Example

#### Server

```javascript
var browserify  = require("browserify"),
browserifyFiles = 
handlebars      = require("handlebars");

var bundle = browserify({
	mount: "/some/file.js",
	watch: true
});

require("browserify-files").register(["html", "txt", "css"], bundle);
bundle.addEntry("/entry.js");
```

#### /entry.js

```javascript
var views = [
	require("./test.html")
];

console.log(views)
```
